00008 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_KERNELS_EPANECHNIKOV_KERNEL_H
00009 #define __MLPACK_CORE_KERNELS_EPANECHNIKOV_KERNEL_H
00010 
00011 #include <boost/math/special_functions/gamma.hpp>
00012 
00013 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00014 #include <mlpack/core/metrics/lmetric.hpp>
00015 
00016 namespace mlpack {
00017 namespace kernel {
00018 
00019 class EpanechnikovKernel
00020 {
00021  public:
00022   EpanechnikovKernel() :
00023     bandwidth(1.0),
00024     inverseBandwidthSquared(1.0) {}
00025   EpanechnikovKernel(double b) :
00026     bandwidth(b),
00027     inverseBandwidthSquared(1.0/(b*b)) {}
00028 
00029   template<typename VecType>
00030   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00031   {
00032     double evaluatee =
00033       1.0 - metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) * inverseBandwidthSquared;
00034     return (evaluatee > 0.0) ? evaluatee : 0.0;
00035   }
00048   template<typename VecType>
00049   double ConvolutionIntegral(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00050   {
00051     double distance = sqrt(metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b));
00052     if (distance >= 2.0 * bandwidth)
00053     {
00054       return 0.0;
00055     }
00056     double volumeSquared = pow(Normalizer(a.n_rows), 2.0);
00057 
00058     switch(a.n_rows)
00059     {
00060       case 1:
00061         return 1.0 / volumeSquared *
00062           (16.0/15.0*bandwidth-4.0*distance*distance /
00063           (3.0*bandwidth)+2.0*distance*distance*distance/
00064           (3.0*bandwidth*bandwidth) -
00065           pow(distance,5.0)/(30.0*pow(bandwidth,4.0)));
00066         break;
00067       case 2:
00068         return 1.0 / volumeSquared *
00069           ((2.0/3.0*bandwidth*bandwidth-distance*distance)*
00070           asin(sqrt(1.0-pow(distance/(2.0*bandwidth),2.0))) +
00071           sqrt(4.0*bandwidth*bandwidth-distance*distance)*
00072           (distance/6.0+2.0/9.0*distance*pow(distance/bandwidth,2.0)-
00073           distance/72.0*pow(distance/bandwidth,4.0)));
00074         break;
00075       default:
00076         Log::Fatal << "Epanechnikov doesn't support your dimension (yet).";
00077         return -1.0;
00078         break;
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00082   double Normalizer(size_t dimension)
00083   {
00084     return 2.0 * pow(bandwidth, dimension) * pow(M_PI, dimension / 2.0) /
00085              (tgamma(dimension / 2.0 + 1.0) * (dimension + 2.0));
00086   }
00087   double Evaluate(double t)
00088   {
00089     double evaluatee = 1.0 - t * t * inverseBandwidthSquared;
00090     return (evaluatee > 0.0) ? evaluatee : 0.0;
00091   }
00092  private:
00093   double bandwidth;
00094   double inverseBandwidthSquared;
00095 };
00096 
00097 }; // namespace kernel
00098 }; // namespace mlpack

00100 #endif
